alert.note: Alert for Grimes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 6:33PM CDT until April 08 at 5:19AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following counties, Grimes, Montgomery and Waller. * WHEN...Until 930 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 627 PM CDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the warned area. Montgomery County OEM reports high water along the following roadways: Glenmont Estates Blvd at Rose Circle, N Mount Mariah Road at FM 1486, 27000 block of Johnson Road, FM 149 between Flamingo Lakes and Bailey Grove Road, Old Dobbin Road at Country Road, 10200 block of County Line Road, Millmac Road at Willis Waukegan, and FM 149 at Stillwater Blvd. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northeastern Conroe, Willis, Pinehurst, Panorama Village, Magnolia, Cut And Shoot, Montgomery, Stagecoach, Todd Mission, Lake Conroe Dam and Dobbin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
